fullText:
Master Mixer

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Artificer
Benefit: You can make alchemical items of your level + 3 or lower. You must have the correct formula and an appropriate skill.
Special: You can take this feat instead of the Ritual Caster feat granted by your class feature.

Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 92.
name: Master Mixer
special: You can take this feat instead of the Ritual Caster feat granted by your class feature.
benefit: You can make alchemical items of your level + 3 or lower. You must have the correct formula and an appropriate skill.
